entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this morning then becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
